author: Brenda Blethyn
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Wash and dry the potatoes, but don't peel them. Cut the potatoes into large wedges and place into a bowl.  Add the remaining ingredients to the bowl and mix well. Tip the potatoes onto a baking tray. Transfer the potatoes to the oven and bake until golden-brown and cooked all the way through (about 30 minutes). Serve the potatoes hot from the oven.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb potatoes,  1 tbsp olive oil,  coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper,  rosemary, chopped, to taste,  crushed garlic, to taste
